channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera

item.title: CVE-2023-27284|2024-08-02T12:09:41.837Z -- ibm -- aspera
item.description: IBM Aspera Cargo 4.2.5 and IBM Aspera Connect 4.2.5 are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. An attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 248616.

item.title: CVE-2023-27286|2024-08-02T12:09:42.508Z -- ibm -- aspera
item.description: IBM Aspera Cargo 4.2.5 and IBM Aspera Connect 4.2.5 are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. An attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 248616.
